long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spron is a chrome extension to generate cron expressions usually needed by programmers, developers and software engineers who work with Spring Framework.  Using this simple extension a spring developer can generate his or her desired cron expression in a second.

- The extension comes with six drop downs (second, minute, hour, date, month, day)
- Select appropriate value from each dropdown
- It is mandatory to select values from all the six(6) dropdowns
- After selection is completed, press the Generate button
- Appropriate cron expression will be displayed on the text box
- One can copy the generated cron pression by pressing the copy button

More features are coming soon! Stay tuned.
